QuestData.Title: Born Free
QuestData.Description: Do you know the story of the great cloud serpents of Pandaria, $n?$B$BSomeday you must hear it. Unfortunately, there is no time to tell it now.$B$BWhat you must know is that the wild cloudrunner serpents of Townlong are in trouble.$B$BThe mogu are capturing wild serpents and corrupting their minds, bending them to their sinister will.$B$BGo to Shan'ze Dao, to the northwest. Free the adult serpents from their chains. Save them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 6 Wild Cloudrunners from their chains.
